client.title: Polar Client
client.description: Enter your Polar Accesslink client ID and secret. If you have not registered your client yet, please visit the [admin dashboard](https://admin.polaraccesslink.com/) to do so. Enter `{callback_url}` as your callback domain and enable access to all data types.

oauth.title: Polar Authorization
oauth.description: Login with your Polar credentials to authorize access to your Polar account.
